mean_en: to produce a change in somebody/something; (of a disease) to attack somebody or a part of the body; to make somebody become ill/sick; to make somebody have strong feelings of sadness, pity, etc.
sentence: Secondhand smoking may affect people's health.
sentence_trans: 吸二手烟会影响人的健康。
word_etyma: af加强 + fect做，制作 → 做得让人加强印象 → affect影响；感动
